abilities.name: Magic Resistance.
abilities.description: The derro savant has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

abilities.name: Spellcasting.
abilities.description:
The derro savant is a 5th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma. The derro knows the following sorcerer spells:
* Cantrips (at will): acid splash, mage hand, message, prestidigitation, ray of frost
* 1st level (4 slots): burning hands, chromatic orb, sleep
* 2nd level (3 slots): invisibility, spider climb
* 3rd level (2 slots): lightning bolt

abilities.name: Sunlight Sensitivity.
abilities.description: While in sunlight, the derro savant has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.
